    • Method Detail

      • createCompressedPosition

        public IPosition createCompressedPosition(double lon,
                                 double lat,
                                 double height,
                                 double speed,
                                 double dir)
        Description copied from interface: IPositionFactory
        Create a compressed position that is a position that can be serialized and send by Internet. This position doesn't contains temporal information. This position implements the method IPosition#toBuffer(ByteBuffer).
        Specified by:
        createCompressedPosition in interface IPositionFactory
        Parameters:
        lon - the longitude in decimal value
        lat - the latitude in decimal value
        height - the height in meters
        speed - the speed
        dir - the direction [0-360]
        Returns:
        a compressed position

      • createCompressedPosition

        public IPosition createCompressedPosition(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Description copied from interface: IPositionFactory
        Create a compressed position from a buffer. The buffer contains the minimum fields of a compressed position
        Specified by:
        createCompressedPosition in interface IPositionFactory
        Parameters:
        buffer - the buffer with the positions fields
        Returns:
        an intialized position.

      • createPosition

        public IPosition createPosition(double lon,
                       double lat,
                       double height,
                       double speed,
                       double dir,
                       double m,
                       long time)
        Description copied from interface: IPositionFactory
        Create a position
        Specified by:
        createPosition in interface IPositionFactory
        Parameters:
        lon - the longitude in decimal value
        lat - the latitude in decimal value
        height - the height in meters
        speed - the speed
        dir - the direction [0-360]
        m - the value of the m coordinate (the offset)
        time - the time
        Returns:
        a position

        Description copied from interface: IPositionFactory
